 2006-10762006-10-05,  HEALTH,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (DATA PROTECTION) which provide new drugs with an internationally-competitive guaranteed minimum period of eight years of market exclusivity and an additional six months of data protection for drugs that have been the subject of clinical trials in children.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2006-0241 Publication Date: 2006-10-18
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (DATA PROTECTION) which provide new drugs with an internationally-competitive guaranteed minimum period of eight years of market exclusivity and an additional six months of data protection for drugs that have been the subject of clinical trials in children.
